pages.title: Local Growth Sprint
pages.metaDescription: A focused 6-week sprint to accelerate local visibility, lead flow, and conversion clarity.

hero.headline: A 6-week sprint to unlock local growth.
hero.subheadline: Targeted SEO, conversion-ready landing pages, and paid media optimization built around measurable pipeline lift.

sections.title: What you get
sections.body: We prioritize the highest leverage wins across visibility, conversion, and retention, then deliver a clear sprint plan with weekly checkpoints.

sections.title: Who it is for
sections.body: Growing local brands ready to build a predictable pipeline without bloated retainers.
